div.a: COVID-19 - Mandated School Closure Frequently Asked Questions

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Welcome to Edon Northwest Local School District

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-qWD73c jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The Edon Northwest Local School District provides all students an exceptional educational experience.

The Edon Northwest Local School District is a community and family-oriented district with a cutting edge and innovative educational environment empowering students to be lifelong learners and well rounded members of society.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Please click on the link below for the school meal survey for the week of April 20, 2020. A new survey will need to be completed each week by Friday to ensure that meals will be distributed on the following Monday. Orders for meal distribution on Monday, April 20th are due by this Friday, April 17th.

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.a: School Meal Survey - Week of April 20th

h3.div: Families who complete the above survey indicating they wish to receive meals for that week, will pick up meals for Monday thru Friday at their selected site (Edon or Northwest) on Monday for the entire week. Each student will receive five meals (breakfast and lunch). We encourage bringing a box or other method to transport the meals.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h2.div: Notice of Proposed Class Action Settlement

div.p: The State of Ohio, the Governor, the Ohio Department of Education, and other state-level defendants to a class action lawsuit have reached a proposed settlement and have requested our District's assistance in informing students and parents of the proposed settlement. A link to the settlement is below. To be clear, our District is not a defendant in this lawsuit and is not accused of any wrongdoing in this lawsuit. We are sharing this information as a courtesy to the Ohio Department of Education and our community:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: In light of recent action from the State of Ohio aimed to limit the spread of COVID19, all Northwest Ohio Early Childhood Developmental Screenings have been postponed.
You are asked to monitor the Northwest Ohio Early Childhood Development Screening Facebook page and/or email and/or phone calls from area code 567 for further information as it becomes available.
Scheduling for all future screenings is on-hold for those who do not yet have an appointment.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Blood Drive scheduled for April 22nd has been cancelled, but if interested in donating that date has been given Wesley United Methodist Church in Bryan.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.strong: Postponed due to Governor DeWine ban on large crowds.

div.p: click on image for registration form

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Contact Jake Bonnell (217-663-7597) or Joe Radabaugh (419-212-0181) with questions and concerns.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.div: Cost is $45.00 from March 2, 2020 through April 30, 2020.

div.p: Click on the image to view the order form.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: click on the image to complete online consent form

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: When: Saturday, May 23rd Where: Edon High School Track Time: 9AM

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-ibL1re purZT-AhqUyc-ibL1re pSzOP-AhqUyc-ibL1re jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: Click on the image to learn how to earn Bonus Box Top Points for our school. We are also continuing to collect Box Tops off selected items. Box Tops can be turned into the main office. Thank you for your continued support of Edon Northwest Local Schools.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-Clt0zb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: The weight room is now open for public use. Forms must be filled out and submitted to the main office along with $5.00 to receive a fob. You may access the forms under the Community Resources > Weight Room header located on the left hand side of this page.
